translations: n.被溺爱的人；爱子；宠爱的动物

sentences.sentence: Stop fondling my limes and do something!
sentences.translation: 别再折腾我的酸橙树了。去做点什么！

sentences.sentence: How can you say I am harsh, you naughty fondling?
sentences.translation: 你怎么能说我苛刻呢，你这怪脾气的宝贝？

sentences.sentence: The story-fondling thing had been going so well.
sentences.translation: 故事安抚的方法一直都采用地很顺利。
